features: 🍃Powerful Air Purification - Our air purifier for home is small in size, but it has a 3-stage filtration system: pre-filter, H13 true HEPA filter, and high-efficiency activated carbon filter. Effectively Clean air pollutants, pet dander, pollen, smoke, and house odor. It is very suitable for office, bedroom, living room, kitchen and other small areas. This is the perfect choice to create a healthy environment for you

🍃Quiet Room Air Purifiers - The air purifier for bedroom adopts a 360 air intake and a powerful motor. The effective purification range is 215 square feet. Silence operation below 20dB , providing a comfortable and quiet sleeping environment for the family

🍃Powerful Function & Efficient - This small room air purifier adopted enhanced air duct system. It can quickly release fresh air, effectively purify the air every minute and block out air-born pollution

🍃Flexible & Compact Design - The air purifier can be easily and flexibly placed anywhere, connected to the power supply with USB Type C cable, and can be directly connected to laptops, mobile power supplies, etc. Fixed wall plugs and sockets are not necessary. Even when traveling, it is an ideal choice for you

🍃Provide Premium Service - If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us and we will give you an answer within 24 hours. There is no power plug in the box, please connect it to 5V/1A power plug or laptop
body.description: InstallThe machine can not work if the filter gate not correct installed.The air inlet hole of the machine should be 20cm above away from the wall and other occlusions.Instructions for UseRemove the filter plastic bag and install the filter (can be used with aromatherapy tablets)Plug in (Please replace the filter element regularly to ensure smooth ventilation. Replacementperiod is 2 months) to ensure effective air purificationIn useStop using at once if the product has abnormal sound ,odor, high temperature or irregular rotation of the fan. Do not put fingers or foreign objects into the air inlet and outlet of the movable part of the protective deviceDo not put hair ,fabric,etc. near the machine to advoid get involved in or block the air inlet and outlet. Do not sit , lean or tilt the machine. When using with household gas appliances together(such as gas stove gas water heater, etc.), please ventilate to avold CO poisoning. Do not pour liquid or powder or fine matter into the machine from the air outlet.
